title: How to Draw a Cartoon Man

steps.title: Start out using a light color.
steps.content: Start out using a light color. Light blue in particular or yellow won't show up if you scan or copy your drawing, so you don't need to erase it. When you are happy with your picture, go over your best lines in black.

steps.title: Draw a circle
steps.content: Draw a circle , which will be the man's head.

steps.title: Draw a rectangle
steps.content: Draw a rectangle , attached to the man's head by a small line, which leaves a space to draw his neck. The rectangle will be the man's chest and stomach area.

steps.title: Draw two stick legs
steps.content: Draw two stick legs on the man.

steps.title: Draw two stick arms
steps.content: Draw two stick arms on the man , and a couple of fingers.

steps.title: Add some more detail
steps.content: Add some more detail to his arms.

steps.title: Add some more detail
steps.content: Add some more detail to his legs.

steps.title: Draw a pair of ears
steps.content: Draw a pair of ears on the man.

steps.title: Add some hair
steps.content: Add some hair on the man if you like.

steps.title: Add detail
steps.content: Add detail to the man's ears.

steps.title: Add the man's facial features
steps.content: Add the man's facial features , including his eyes, nose, mouth and eyebrows. Always remember that people's eyes are positioned halfway down their heads, not at the top. You can adjust his expression by the slope of the eyebrows and the angle or curve of the mouth.

steps.title: Draw a shirt
steps.content: Draw a shirt on the man.

steps.title: Draw, and add detail, to your man's fingers.
steps.content: Draw, and add detail , to your man's fingers. Some people find it more pleasing to only draw three fingers and a thumb, but it's up to you.

steps.title: Add detail to the remaining parts of your man
steps.content: Add detail to the remaining parts of your man , including his pants and shoes. Don't forget that people's heels extend past the line of the leg.
